description: Conservation Area Consent application in connection with the partial demolition of the rear of Loxford House, change of use and the erection of a four storey rear extension to Loxford House including the provision of 297sqm of nursery/cr√®che/community facility (Class D1). Demolition of the remaining buildings within the site (not within the conservation area) and the erection of part 3, 4 and 5 storey flatted blocks, houses and town houses providing for a total of 143 residential dwellings together with the creation of a new publicly accessible open space, car parking, cycle parking, landscaping and other associated works.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission. 

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
